description: Deploy a live Vibe Landing Zone with IBM Cloud Object Storage (Lite) and optional IBM Cloud Functions for push-to-COS and push-to-Project actions.

variables.name: ibmcloud_api_key
variables.description: IBM Cloud API key for authentication.

variables.name: region
variables.description: IBM Cloud region for deployment (e.g. us-south).

variables.description: Resource Group ID where resources are deployed.

outputs.name: primaryoutputlink

outputs.name: vibe_bucket_name
outputs.description: COS bucket name created for your deployment.
